name: Cosmos (itch) (Valdriks the Jazzborn)
description:
Ascend into the cosmos as you avoid birds and logs in this arcade-style casual game. 

Use the arrow keys to move. Collect hearts to help restore your health. Your score is based on how long you stay in the sky.

This is my first Unity game, so don't expect much. However, as it is an endless game, hopefully you'll at least have a little fun playing it.

Known glitches:
Heart item does not disappear on contact as it's supposed to, but it still serves its basic function.
